summary: Feature request to expose the ability to configure OTel metrics to use HTTP instead of the default gRPC protocol in the Ruby SDK. This aligns with a similar enhancement being considered for the Core library.
userImpact: Users will have the option to export OTel metrics over HTTP instead of being limited to gRPC, providing more flexibility in observability setup.
proposedFix: Add a simple boolean configuration option (default false) to enable HTTP protocol for OTel metrics.
keyQuote: Expose ability to have Core OTel metrics use HTTP instead of default gRPC protocol.
